author: schneiml
body:
#### PR description:

This looks like an old variation of Historic DQM. Since the new HDQM
managed by the DQM group since more than a year lives outside CMSSW,
and Tracker HDQM did for a long time before, I assume this is unused.

I can't tell if anybody is using maybe some of the funcitonality in that
package, but removing it is probably the best way to find out.

#### PR validation:
None; assuming package is unused.
title: DQM: Remove DQMServices/Diagnostic
